title: Demerger to secure synergies across biz verticals, says Tata Motors Chairman N Chandrasekaran
description: Tata Motors is planning to demerge its existing automotive businesses into two listed entities, a move aimed at enhancing synergies across its Passenger Vehicles (PV) and Jaguar Land Rover (JLR) segments. This step is expected to boost collaborations in electric vehicles (EVs) and autonomous vehicles. Tata Motors Chairman N Chandrasekaran made this announcement at the company's 79th Annual General Meeting on Monday.
